alert.note: Alert for Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:52AM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing rain is expected. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Inland San Patricio and Coastal San Patricio. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from late Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio
